notes.text:
This update for policycoreutils fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2018-1063: Prevent chcon from following symlinks in /tmp, /var/tmp,
  /var/run and /var/lib/debug (bsc#1083624).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: Context relabeling of filesystems is vulnerable to symbolic link attack, allowing a local, unprivileged malicious entity to change the SELinux context of an arbitrary file to a context with few restrictions. This only happens when the relabeling process is done, usually when taking SELinux state from disabled to enable (permissive or enforcing). The issue was found in policycoreutils 2.5-11.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
